subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Maybe good news,
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
Well, the same people who told us it's there in the first place put up the
photos of the comet as it progressively got smaller.  Since the source of
the info is the same people, why would you believe it was there in the first
place if you don't believe the photos they are now putting up? Maybe it was
never even there in the first place.

Zack

purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
